# Thief Ward, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, M

**Range:** Personal

**Area:** 50-foot-diameter sphere centered on you

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower 

*Greater thief ward* creates an area where sounds are magnified, shadows lessened, and details brightened. All [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] and [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks made within the area suffer a â€“20 penalty.
